ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Connect time?
ygData.msgSnippet: My husband and I kept going LD last night and that s what it was doing when we tried to sign back on.  Computer #1 is P2-350 256 meg ram, Windows ME, 40 gig
ygData.messageBody:
My husband and I kept going LD last night and that's what it was doing when
we tried to sign back on.  Computer #1 is P2-350 256 meg ram, Windows ME, 40
gig HD, 8x burner.  Computer #2 is Celeron 533, 192 meg ram, 10 gig HD,
Windows ME.  Both are on cable modem using ICS.  We finally gave up because
of the lag and linkdead problems and then trying to get signed back into
game.  



Is it just me, or is it taking longer and longer to connect?  I couldn't
even get past the login screen for 5 or 10 minutes.  Kept saying that it
couldn't connect to login server.  Never had that happen unless it was down
for a patch (which it wasn't).  Also noticed that the times when I choose
my server, and going to the character screen, and the time from the
character screen to the game are much longer.

I'm running a Celeron 533 w/ 185 MB ram, windows ME a cable modem, and
about 2GB of drive space for windows to write to.  Any suggestions?
